DOC.brief_title: Multi-Reader Multi-Case Study Identify Uterine Contractions Recorded From Laboring Nonlaboring Patients Practicing Clinicians
DOC.detailed_description: The SureCALL® Labor Monitor® ( SureCALL® ) transabdominal electromyography monitor intend measure uterine activity . It intend use pregnant woman , singleton pregnancy , use surface electrode maternal abdomen . The device intend use healthcare professional clinical setting . This multi-reader multi-case study design evaluate performance SureCALL® predicate Tocodynamometer device ( TOCO ) . This study involve 25 woman Gestational Age 36 week less 5 woman Gestation Age great 36 labor five clinical site . Each study subject instrument two technology measure uterine activity : 1 . Standard tocodynamometer attach maternal abdomen , 2 . SureCALL® set abdominal surface electrode uterine electromyography attach maternal abdomen An assessment obtain quantified mask , qualified clinical obstetrician reader evaluation equivalence labor monitor device identify isolation individual uterine contraction signal peak contraction signal record labor monitor device .
DOC.criteria: Singleton Pregnancy Informed Consent Required Multifetal Pregnancy Informed Consent Not Given
